page.title: 19The School Pageant
page.content: Our pageant this year will be about forests. We have chosen a certain number of songs, poems, mime, music and plays. We have a guitar, a clarinet, and some recorders to play the music for us. Our plays "The Tree God", "The Silver Groat", and "The Robin Hood Ballad" will be acted. There is a story called "The Squirrel Wife" which is told by the child in the top year called Sally Warne. The play "The Silver Groat" is about a young boy called Hugh Lambert who meets King Edward 1st and they have a shooting contest using a bow and arrow. King Edward is played by Simon Adams, and Lambert is played by Philip Coghlan. The trees and woods have gifts for us, and they breath life into our world. Without trees none of us could live.
